name: Wunder Water Ring-Toss Demo
description:
Enjoy this small demo of the ring-toss game mode from 'Wunder Water Games,' Currently in open beta test on the Google Play Store.

Controls for the demo allow on screen click/touch and special keyboard keys for controlling tilt controls that exist in the Android mobile version.

Tilt control - Left / Right arrow keys, or A/D keys control tilting left and right.

Plunger control - Space bar will push down the plunger, as well as the usual click/touch the plunger directly.

All other controls are touch/click buttons.

The full version includes:

  • 2 game modes (the well known 'ring-toss' and 'pyramid').
  • 4 unlock-able difficulties per game mode.
  • 4 award levels for each difficulty to measure your skill.
  • Tilt control using device gyroscope to better control the game rings and blocks.
  • A small selection of relaxing music and background images while you play.

Follow @OldManAnimal on Twitter to keep up to date on the full release or upcoming new game modes.
